verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Heavenly sunlight,
Heavenly sunlight,
Flooding my soul
with glory divine:

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, I am rejoicing,
Singing His praises,
Jesus is mine.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
Jesus has said
"I'll never forsake thee".
Promise divine
that never can fail.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Shadows around me,
shadows above me,
Never conceal
my Saviour and Guide;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He is the light,
in Him is no darkness;
Ever I’m walking
close to His side.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
In the bright sunlight,
ever rejoicing,
Pressing my way
to mansions above;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Singing His praises
gladly I’m walking,
Walking in sunlight,
sunlight of love.
